relation: Great for these types of students
Great for students looking for smaller class sizes with professors who acknowledge each student, for lower cost, and convenient to northwest GA area
There are many opportunities to socially mingle with activities to do.
The new added cafeteria at the Cartersville campus is a great convenience.
The academics are hard if you want them to be. If you pay attention and study, you will succeed. The coarse taken determines how rigorous study will be.
The library and tutor center WILL help you. Go ask them. Go to your first day of class before you buy your book, you could be able to use an older edition and pay less $.
Georgia Highlands is a great community college. It offers small class sizes, great professors, and plenty of support. This is the ideal college for your 2 year degree.
pageTitle: Georgia Highlands College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Jasmine from Douglasville, GA 05/16/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 48 Categories Comments Campus Safety Some incidents, but overall it is very safe. Clubs and Activities More like clubs rather than activities or sports. Great for these types of students Focused. Want to get done with school fast. Looking for great campus that is very diverse. Bang for the buck Classes are fairly priced and much cheaper than most colleges. What to do for fun Very Diverse Campus & Tons Of Different People .... The School Does Offer Clubs. Food and Dining Unless your at the Marietta campus, you do not have a cafeteria on campus, your best bet would be local restaurants. Dorm Life
